amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 118-4 to require the inflation estimate to be made publicly available by publishing on the OMB website.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the inflation estimate to be made publicly available by publishing on the Office of Management and Budget website.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 386 - 31 (Roll no. 126).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Boebert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 386 - 31 (Roll no. 126).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
